summary: the SARS-CoV is a single-stranded RNA virus that has been identified as a new type of coronavirus. the genome is approximately 30 kb long and contains four structural proteins. the sequence analysis of SARS-CoV with other members of the coronavirus family did not show more than 20% nucleotide homology.
